name: Henna And Nail Salon
description:
Henna & Nail salon a long waited game.

fulfill your dreams with different hand art design on backside of hand.

do a manicure of your nails select nail type in a nail salon click on nail and fill different color of nail polish.

Once you apply nail polish you can decorate nails with different stickers.

After applying stickers and object you can select different hand and can apply different Henna (Mehndi).

We will love you valuable feedback for this games so we can give you updates and new version of similar Nail salon games.

Enjoy hand simulation and henna.
